mapper.insert: insert into acct_user_grp_r2_sys_res_role (user_grp_sid, sys_res_role_sid, created_by, created_time, updated_time, version_num) values (#{userGrpSid}, #{sysResRoleSid}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{versionNum})

insert into acct_user_grp_r2_sys_res_role (user_grp_sid, sys_res_role_sid, created_by, created_time, updated_time, version_num) values
(#{item.userGrpSid}, #{item.sysResRoleSid}, #{item.createdBy}, #{item.createdTime}, #{item.updatedTime}, #{item.versionNum})
mapper.update:
update acct_user_grp_r2_sys_res_role
version_num = version_num + 1,
user_grp_sid = #{userGrpSid},
sys_res_role_sid = #{sysResRoleSid},
updated_by = #{updatedBy},
updated_time = #{updatedTime},
where sid = #{sid} and version_num = #{versionNum}
